#define CSL_WDT_WAIT_FOR_WRITE(regField)   while(0U != ((hWdt->WWPS) & regField))

Detailed Description

Macro Definition Documentation

#define CSL_WDT_WAIT_FOR_WRITE (   regField)    while(0U != ((hWdt->WWPS) & regField))

This macro will check for write POSTED status of WDT registers.

Parameters
regFieldWrite posted status register field whose status needs to be checked. regField will take values from the following enum #CSL_wdtWritePost_t
